alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 13 at 1:19PM MST until September 14 at 3:15AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH 5 PM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE ARIZONA STRIP... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following area, Northwest Plateau and Arizona Strip * WHEN...Through 5 PM MST Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of washes and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Numerous thunderstorms will produce rounds of heavy rain across the Northwest Plateau and Arizona Strip of Mohave County through Wednesday afternoon. Storms may move repeatedly over some sites. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
